wireframe:
WEBSITE WIREFRAME
==================

Section 1: HERO
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: headline, expertise-statement, consultation-cta
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: large

Section 2: SERVICES
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: service-cards, icons, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: medium

Section 3: EXPERTISE
========================================
Layout: grid-4-column
Components: expertise-areas, icons, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-4-column
Spacing: medium

Section 4: CASE-STUDIES
========================================
Layout: grid-2-column
Components: case-study-cards, results, metrics
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: grid-2-column
  Desktop: grid-2-column
Spacing: large

Section 5: TEAM
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: consultant-cards, photos, credentials, specialties
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: large

Section 6: TESTIMONIALS
========================================
Layout: carousel
Components: testimonial-cards, client-logos, quotes
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: carousel
  Desktop: carousel
Spacing: large

Section 7: CTA
========================================
Layout: split-form
Components: headline, consultation-form, contact-info
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: split
  Desktop: split-form
Spacing: large
